database_tables.users_table: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS users(username VARCHAR(50) PRIMARY KEY, password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
database_tables.jwt_data: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS jwt_data(username VARCHAR(50) PRIMARY KEY, jwt_token TEXT NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (username) REFERENCES users(username) ON DELETE CASCADE)

select_queries.check_email: select count(1) from users where email = ?
select_queries.check_username: select count(1) from users where username = ?
select_queries.get_hashed_password: select password from users where username = ? or email = ?
select_queries.check_user_jwt: select count(1) from jwt_data where username = ? and jwt_token = ?

insert_queries.insert_user: insert into users (username, password, email) values (?, ?, ?)

delete_queries.delete_jwt: delete from jwt_data where username = ? and jwt_token = ?
